translations.translation: Say: 'It would not matter if you were rock or iron,
Tell them: "(Even if) you turn to stones or steel,
Tell them: "(You will be raised afresh even if) you turn to stone or iron,
(Muhammad), say "Yes, even if you become rocks, iron,
Say: 'Let you be stones, or iron,
Say: Be ye stones or iron
Say, "[yes] even if you turned to stones or iron,
Say thou: become ye stones or iron.
Say, ‘[That is bound to happen] even if you should become stones, or iron,
Say: "(Nay!) be ye stones or iron,
Say (O Muhammad SAW) "Be you stones or iron,"
Say: 'Let you be stones or iron,
Say, “Even if you become rocks or iron.
[17:50] Say, to them: ‘Be stones or iron,
(Say) to them, Muhammad: (Be ye stones) whether you are stones or something harder (or iron) or even stronger than iron,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { قُلْ } يا أكمل الرسل في جوابهم تبكيتاً لهم والزاماً: لا تستبعدوا أيها الضالون المعاندون أمثال هذا البعث والحياء عن قدرة الله في الأشياء التي عهدوا حياتهم من قبل؛ إذ لا بُعْدَ ولا غرابة فيها، بل { كُونُواْ حِجَارَةً } أبعد بمراحل عن قبول الحياة { أَوْ حَدِيداً } [الإسراء: 50] هو أشدّ بعداً
